verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: By the sky with the constellations.
verse.verse_3: And by the witness and the witnessed.
verse.verse_4: Destroyed were the People of the Trench.
verse.verse_7: And were witnessing what they did to the believers.
verse.verse_8: They begrudged them only because they believed in God the Almighty, the Praiseworthy.
verse.verse_9: To Whom belongs the sovereignty of the heavens and the earth. God is witness over everything.
verse.verse_10: Those who tempt the believers, men and women, then do not repent; for them is the punishment of Hell; for them is the punishment of Burning.
verse.verse_11: Those who believe and do righteous deeds will have Gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great triumph.
verse.verse_12: The onslaught of your Lord is severe.
verse.verse_13: It is He who begins and repeats.
verse.verse_14: And He is the Forgiving, the Loving.
verse.verse_17: Has there come to you the story of the legions?
verse.verse_19: In fact, those who disbelieve are in denial.
verse.verse_20: And God encloses them from beyond.
verse.verse_21: In fact, it is a Glorious Quran.
